price: Wahai orang-orang kafir! Janganlah kamu mengemukakan alasan pada hari ini. Sesungguhnya kamu hanya diberi balasan menurut apa yang telah kamu kerjakan.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna kafarū lā taʿtadhirū al-yawma innamā tuj'zawna mā kuntum taʿmalūna
